sentences.en: Candidates running for president often delude the voters with election promises.
sentences.cn: 参加总统竞选的候选人往往以竞选许诺来哄骗选民.

sentences.en: Don’t be deluded into thinking your house is burglarproof.
sentences.cn: 不要误以为你的房子是绝对防盗的。

sentences.en: Don't delude yourself into believing that she will marry you.
sentences.cn: 不要自欺,别以为她会嫁给你.

sentences.en: He's a snob, deceiving his superiors and delude his subordinates.
sentences.cn: 他是个势力小人, 欺上瞒下.

sentences.en: I say this so that no one will delude you with persuasive argument.
sentences.cn: 西2:4我说这话、免得有人用花言巧语迷惑你们.

sentences.en: I was angry with him for trying to delude me.
sentences.cn: 他想骗我，因此我很恼火。

sentences.en: It can so easily delude itself.
sentences.cn: 这些想法很容易迷惑人.

sentences.en: Jas .1:22 And become doers of the word and not hearers only, who delude themselves.
sentences.cn: 雅一22只是你们要作行道者,不要单作听道者, 自己欺哄自己.
我们还是不要再自欺欺人了!

sentences.en: Mistakes live in the neighbourhood of truth and therefore delude us.
sentences.cn: 错误往往在真理的隔壁,所以我们常常搞错.

sentences.en: Neither side should delude itself that it can avoid the harm caused by an increased mutual antagonism;
sentences.cn: 任何一方都不应迷惑他自己，认为增长的相互对立所带来的伤害是可以避免；

sentences.en: Neither side should delude itself that it can avoid the harm caused by an increased mutual antagonism; both should understand that a crisis in one country can hurt the other.
sentences.cn: 任何一方都不应迷惑他自己，认为增长的相互对立所带来的伤害是可以避免；双方都应认识到，一国的危机可以伤害到另一国。

sentences.en: Then said the delude Fox, " what need was there for me to speak? "
sentences.cn: 这时,上了当的狐狸说道: “ 我还有什么必要说话 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: We delude ourselves that we are in control.
sentences.cn: 我们骗自己说我们掌控着局面。

sentences.en: You must not delude him into believing it.
sentences.cn: 你不可误导他相信那件事.

sentences.en: You won't delude him into believing it.
sentences.cn: 你不能诱使他相信此事.

trans.tran_en: to make someone believe something that is not true
